code: @Test public void testDefaultThreadPoolProfile() throws Exception {     CamelContext context = getMandatoryBean(CamelContext.class, "camel-B").     ThreadPoolProfile profile = context.getExecutorServiceManager().getDefaultThreadPoolProfile().     assertEquals(25, profile.getMaxPoolSize().intValue()).     // should inherit default values     assertEquals(10, profile.getPoolSize().intValue()).     assertEquals(60, profile.getKeepAliveTime().longValue()).     assertEquals(1000, profile.getMaxQueueSize().intValue()).     assertEquals(ThreadPoolRejectedPolicy.CallerRuns, profile.getRejectedPolicy()). }
